extension.summary: Browse extras from the video library
extension.description:
This add-on lets you view your movie and TV show extras/special features directly from the library. To access extras, open the context menu on a video in the library and click 'Extras'.
By default, the add-on will look in the ".extras" sub-directory for content (can be changed in settings).
